item.title: Privacy covers on "selected" devices
item.description: This just bothers me beyond belief… Right, so we all know how people on both Mac, Windows and even Linux use privacy covers for their laptops and desktop webcams?

item.title: test post
item.description: Welcome to the Tommerty Blog This is my first post using Hugo the Congo theme, so fingers crossed all goes well!
